page.title: 03ECOLOGY IN N.HAM /COLL P.
page.content: The centre of North Hammersmith & Kensington is covered by wasteland, Wormwood Scrubs. Parts of this wasteland have been developed into an adventure playground for children, made mainly from logs and wood. There is also an area designated for wild life to grow and develop. There is an area of tents called Tent City,where people can stay temporarily. A stadium has been built for people to use for athletic training and school sports day,there is also a football ground, cycle speedway track, tennis courts, and playing field.A canal runs to the north of the Scrubs land and follows the railway.The canal has been polluted over the years, and at present, work is underway to restore the canal to its former state.
